1.desc: Money that is used in all sorts of scenarios in Project Identity.
1.name: Funds

2.desc:
$1
Mood affects how many stats and Funds you get.
0 - 19: Depressed - 40% less Funds
20 to 39: Sad - 20% less Funds
40 to 59: Normal - No effect
60 to 100: Happy - 40% more Funds
2.name: Mood

3.desc: Used for going outside. Automatically recovers every turn.
3.name: Action points

4.desc:
Having main screen conversations can increase your Affection.
You can get rewards from increasing your Affection as well.
4.name: Affection
